item.title: 10-排序6 Sort with Swap(0, i)
item.description: 题目来自—中国大学MOOC-陈越、何钦铭-数据结构-2020春 Given any permutation of the numbers {0, 1, 2,…, N−1}, it is easy to sort them in increasing order. But what if Swap(0, *) is the ONLY operation that
